item.title: Tech Exchange
item.description: This series features conversations between FT journalists and the technology industry’s leaders, innovators, and thinkers. In the latest instalment, Synthesia’s Victor Riparbelli talks about his mission to reinvent video content creation and how Europe can compete in the global AI race
